availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Union County, Kentucky, farmer. Union County native. Son of Thomas Barker and Sarah Lay Barker. Married to Amelia Rachel Hosman Barker on April 1, 1846. Father of William Thomas Barker and Susan Emma Barker. Farmer in Union County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Union County, p. 43.
Find A Grave, "Thomas Hardin Barker (October 18, 1820-May 7, 1909)," Memorial #102447383, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/102447383 (accessed May 11, 2018).
